name: Dacquari Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: This was a very popular cocktail in America before Prohibition. Bacardi is made in Cuba.

name: Derby Cocktail
instruction: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with an olive.
note: Recipe by E. G. De Gastreaux, Cincinnati, 1903.

name: Desert Healer
instruction: Shake well, strain into a large tumbler, and fill the balance with ginger beer.

name: Doctor Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Dome Cocktail
note: Recipe by Carey, bartender, Dome Cafe, Montparnasse, Paris.

name: Douglas Cocktail
instruction: Shake well, strain, and squeeze an orange peel on top.

name: Du Barry Cocktail
instruction: Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass with a quarter slice of orange.

name: Dubonnet Fizz
instruction: Shake well, strain into a wineglass, and top with a squirt of syphon.
